Hi! I'm Tyler Binning an aspiring Data Scientist,

This Blog serves as part of my Senior Capstone Project at Brigham Young University of Idaho. 

My Project entails developing and implementing an Algorithmic Trading Bot. I intially got interested in Data Science through involvement a youth stock trading competition I enrolled in my Sophmore year of Highschool. Now I am returning to the world of financial data with a supercharged skill set.

There are mulitple blog posts covering basic concepts, idea exploration, and implementation of strategies.
